Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Lakers will square off with the Philadelphia 76ers in NBA action at Crypto.com Arena on Saturday, beginning at 2:00pm AEDT.
With the likes of Anthony Davis, LeBron James and Rui Hachimura, the Lakers are looking to overcome a 76ers line-up that includes Paul George, Kelly Oubre and Andre Drummond.
Stats Insider's predictive analytics model currently gives the Lakers a 72% chance of defeating the 76ers at Crypto.com Arena.
The Lakers are 7.5-point favourites against the 76ers, with odds of $1.91 available at Bet365.
According to Stats Insider's analytics model, the 76ers (+7.5) are predicted to cover the line 54% of the time.
Stats Insider's predicted final score for Lakers vs 76ers at Crypto.com Arena on Saturday is the Lakers winning 115-108.
